text: Hans Bild (28 January 1926 – 15 May 2004) was a German footballer who played for Borussia Neunkirchen and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2004 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:Association football forwards
title: Hans Bild
